org.eclipse.californium.core.coap

Class OptionNumberRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.californium.core.coap.OptionNumberRegistry

  • public final class OptionNumberRegistry
extends Object
    This class describes the CoAP Option Number Registry as defined in RFC 7252, Section 12.2 and other CoAP extensions.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  OptionNumberRegistry.Defaults
      Option default values.
      static class  OptionNumberRegistry.Names
      Option names.
      static class  OptionNumberRegistry.optionFormats
      The format types of CoAP options.
